name: Rebelstar Raiders
overview: This turn-based strategy game includes three different scenarios: "Moonbase", "Starlingale", and "The Final Assault" . Each player controls between twenty and thirty characters with individual characteristics and armed with various weapons. In each scenario, each player's units are deployed manually before play commences. The computer can be in three different modes during the game; cursor mode, movement mode or ranged combat mode. Rebelstar Raiders does not feature a computer-controlled opponent, so it is strictly a two-player game.
